title: Starblood, the graphic novel.
description: STARBLOOD, a tale of magic and horror and the debut novel by Carmilla Voiez, has been transformed into a graphic novel by Anna Dmitrieva.Blinded by love, Satori, a young magician, attempts a spell that goes horribly wrong, resulting in the demon Lilith returning to Earth. Satori knows he must send Lilith back. The dark goddess, brimming with power, makes it her mission to wreak havoc on Satori's life by ensnaring Star, the woman he loves, and her friends into a web of chaos and deceit.
author: Carmilla Voiez
